channel.title: Toroidal Transformer on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Toroidal Transformer on SUPER-Lab

item.title: 3-D Printed Air-Core Toroidal Transformer for High-Frequency Power Conversion
item.description: This paper presents a nested toroidal air-core transformer utilizing a 3-D printing and electroplating fabrication methodology. The first part of this work discusses design equations to achieve the target inductance matrix. Lastly, this work provides experimental demonstrations of the transformer design including a 40.68 MHz 48-to-350 V resonant dc-dc converter.
